scripts.say: How's the situation looking?
She finally regained consciousness just earlier, but I don't have much more good news for you. She's going to need more rest, and won't be taking any visitors today.
Hatakaze shook her head as she explained the situation to Kaga, her voice on the verge of cracking.
During her examination, we found out that Amagi's wisdom cube had been severely damaged. Nobody knows exactly what caused it though...
As a matter of fact, she most likely has been dealing with this for some time now.
The problem must have flared up when she overexerted herself earlier on the Mirror Sea...
However, I'm worried that...
That what?
... that in this state, she won't even be able to have a normal civilian life, let alone receive her carrier remodel.
Just consider this the worst case scenario. I haven't spoken a word of this to anyone else....
... even to the one who is currently undergoing her remodel.
Kaga staggered off in a stupor, as if unable to accept what she just heard.
Hatakaze...?
I'm right here, Amagi.
There's... just one more thing left to do... please...
Of course. I will make sure it is done.
And with that, the day of destiny arrived.
I am Nagato, flagship of the Combined Fleet. Subjects of the Sakura Empire, lend me your ear!
As you may have heard, Sirens encroached upon our waters when we were ill prepared.
They captured and converted one of our training grounds into a Mirror Sea. We must take heed and learn from the consequences of our strategic oversight.
As a result, the Combined Fleet shall strengthen its perimeter defenses, patrolling and establishing garrisons on remote islands. We are also forming a plan to reclaim what was taken from us.
Therefore, in order to strengthen our torpedo squadrons and our main fleets to defend against potential large-scale Siren invasions, we shall hold another Naval Exercise!
Like last time, Red Team will be on the offensive, and Blue Team will be on the defensive!
Those of you who wish to leave a strong impression, do your best to display your formidable power and your graceful technique!
By my decree, the island defense wargame shall now commence!
(Amagi... is this what you wanted...?)
